oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exterior view of the Parks cotton gin in Gleason, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows several men, women, and children posing for a photograph along with mules and wagons outside a cotton gin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cotton; Cotton Industry
